publicationstmt.publisher: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-06 10:23:20 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the Tufts alumni magazine from 1947 to 1969 which replaced the Tufts Topics. This magazine was itself replaced in 1969 by the Tufts Criterion.
Volume numbering begins in 1947 with vol. 1, runs through vol. 7 in 1952. The 1953 volume is numbered vol. 53, and 1954 is vol. 54. In 1955 numbering begins with vol. 1 again.

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is processed and open for research

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Volume numbering begins in 1947 with vol. 1, runs through vol. 7 in 1952. The 1953 volume is numbered vol. 53, and 1954 is vol. 54. In 1955 numbering begins with vol. 1 again. Tufts alumni magazine from 1947 to 1969, replacing the Tufts Topics. This magazine was itself replaced in 1969 by the Tufts Criterion.
